alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 4:08AM EST until December 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional total snow accumulations up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Western Clinton County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow could lead to power outages, especially above 1500 ft.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Windsor
